test-case.name: fn-normalize-unicode-1
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn:normalize-unicode to ensure that " NFC " is the same as "NFC".

test-case.name: fn-normalize-unicode-2
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn:normalize-unicode with a normalization form that attempts to raise a non-implemented form

test-case.description: Evaluation of fn:normalize-unicode with nothing to normalize and used as argument to fn:upper-case

test-case.description: Evaluation of fn:normalize-unicode with nothing to normalize and used as argument to fn:lower-case

test-case.description: Evaluation of fn:normalize-unicode with nothing to normalize and used as argument to fn:concat

test-case.description: Evaluation of fn:normalize-unicode with nothing to normalize and used as argument to fn:substring

test-case.description: Evaluation of fn:normalize-unicode with noncharacter argument

test-case.name: fn-normalize-unicode-10
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn:normalize-unicode with noncharacters in argument

test-case.name: fn-normalize-unicode-11
test-case.description: Bug 7935: normalize-unicode() applied to unassigned codepoints Result should be empty, indicating that normalization is idempotent on these characters derived from the Unicode 5.2 database - essentially a list of characters that are legal in XML but undefined in Unicode 5.2

modified.change: Fixed test file reference, see bug 27824

test-case.name: fn-normalize-unicode-11-6-0
test-case.description: Bug 7935: normalize-unicode() applied to unassigned codepoints Result should be empty, indicating that normalization is idempotent on these characters derived from the Unicode 6.0 database - essentially a list of characters that are legal in XML but undefined in Unicode

modified.change: Fixed test file reference, see bug 27824

test-case.name: fn-normalize-unicode-11-6-2
test-case.description: Bug 7935: normalize-unicode() applied to unassigned codepoints Result should be empty, indicating that normalization is idempotent on these characters derived from the Unicode 6.2 database - essentially a list of characters that are legal in XML but undefined in Unicode

modified.change: Fixed test file reference, see bug 27824

test-case.name: K-NormalizeUnicodeFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `normalize-unicode()`.

test-case.name: K-NormalizeUnicodeFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `normalize-unicode("a string", "NFC", "wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-NormalizeUnicodeFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `normalize-unicode("a string", "example.com/notSupported/")`.

test-case.name: K-NormalizeUnicodeFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `normalize-unicode("foo") eq "foo"`.

test-case.name: K-NormalizeUnicodeFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `normalize-unicode("foo", "NFC") eq "foo"`.

test-case.name: K-NormalizeUnicodeFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `normalize-unicode("foo", "NFD") eq "foo"`.

test-case.name: K-NormalizeUnicodeFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `normalize-unicode("foo", "NFKD") eq "foo"`.

test-case.name: K-NormalizeUnicodeFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `normalize-unicode("foo", "NFKC") eq "foo"`.

test-case.name: K-NormalizeUnicodeFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `normalize-unicode("f oo", "") eq "f oo"`.

test-case.name: K-NormalizeUnicodeFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `normalize-unicode("foo", "") eq "foo"`.

test-case.name: K-NormalizeUnicodeFunc-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `normalize-unicode("f oo") eq "f oo"`.

test-case.name: K-NormalizeUnicodeFunc-12
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `normalize-unicode("f oo", "NFC") eq "f oo"`.

test-case.name: K-NormalizeUnicodeFunc-13
test-case.description: Static typing implementations may raise XPTY0004. See http://www.w3.org/Bugs/Public/show_bug.cgi?id=4551 for details.

test-case.description: tests FULLY-NORMALIZED

test-case.description: tests normalize-unicode on empty

test-case.description: Tests normalize-unicode on empty

test-case.description: Tests a composing character by itself
